title: SET_PED_CYCLE_VEHICLE_WEAPONS_ONLY
content:
0x50276EF8172F5F120xE3DB81AC// SetPedCycleVehicleWeaponsOnly
void SET_PED_CYCLE_VEHICLE_WEAPONS_ONLY(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The ped handleRestricts weapon selection when cycling through weapons, to select only vehicle weapons.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for SET_PED_CYCLE_VEHICLE_WEAPONS_ONLY
SetPedCycleVehicleWeaponsOnly(ped)
